1.q_string:
Direction: Match  column I (terms) with column II (examples)

  Column I  Column II
 a. Monoecious i. Pheretima sps, Taenia sps
 b. Dioecious ii. Carica papaya, Phoenix dactylifera 
 c.  Hermaphrodites  iii.  Cocos sps, Cucurbita sps
In which of the following organism, testes descends into scrotum in breeding season but in non-breeding season goes up?
Which of the following species has nucellar embryology?
Prolonged use of seeds of Lathyrus sativus causes a debilitating disorder due to presence of:
What do A, B, C, and D represent?
q_option: A - Infundibulum, B - Fertilisation, C - Myometrium, D - Morula
A - Infundibulum, B - Ovum, C - Endometrium, D - Morula
A - Isthmus, B - Fertilisation, C - Myometrium, D - Blastocyst
A - Isthmus, B - Ovum, C - Endometrium, D - Morula

1.q_string:
Below is given the unorganised list of some important events in the human female reproductive cycle. Identify the correct sequence of these event and select the correct option.

(i) Secretion of FSH

(ii) Growth of corpus luteum

(iii) Growth of the follicle and oogenesis

(iv) Ovulation

(v) Sudden increase in levels of LH
In which of the following cases, a woman is said to have secondary infertility?
q_option: She has a child who is having genetic disability and is unable to conceive for second time.
She hasn't conceived at all even after regular unprotected sex.
She had a miscarriage once and is unable to conceive for second time.

1.q_string:
Read the following four statements (a - d) and answer as asked next to them:

a) Stilbestrol is used in the treatment of female animals for infertility.

b) Stilbestrol is a careinogen.

c) Stilbestrol is induced lactation in sterile female animals.

d) stilbestrol is a synthetic progesterone.

How many of the above statements are correct?
Mendel's laws were first published in the year:

Study the pedigree chart given below

What does it show:
DNA is not directly involved with the synthesis of which one of the following?
Degeneracy of genetic code is due to:
Lichen can be used as industrial pollution indicators because:
q_option: They will not grow in polluted area
They will grow well in polluted area
They show dark colour in polluted area

1.q_string: Which of the following sequences fits into the organic evolution theory proposed by Charles Darwin and Alfred Wallace?
q_option: Variations, constancy of population size, overpopulation, natural selection
Variations, overpopulation, constancy of population size, natural selection
Overpopulation, variations, constancy of population size, natural selection
Overpopulation, constancy of population size, variations, natural selection

1.q_string: Where memory cells are formed?

________ was served to the cows for enhancing the yield of milk before it was banned in 1979.
A system of rotating crops with legume or grass pasture to improve soil structure and fertility is called:

Which among these is produced by distillation of fermented broth?
(i) Whiskey (ii) Wine (iii) Beer (iv) Rum (v) Brandy

q_option: Alkaline medium renders it soluble and amenable by proteases

1.q_string: The technique used to produce a large number of genetically identical offspring is called:
Which of the following methods should be used to increase crop production without use of chemicals and fertilizers?
Gene encoding hirudin is synthesized to:
Biotic potential can be described as:
q_option: population size limit that environment can support

1.q_string: Which of the following biomass has few trees, a hot climate throughout the year, and alternating wet and dry seasons?
Which of the following may cause algal blooms in the aquatic system?
Quantities of mineral nutrients in soils of tropical rainforests are relatively low because:
q_option: microorganisms that recycle chemicals are not very abundant in tropical soils.
decomposition of organic refuse and reassimilation of chemicals by primary productivity occur rapidly.
nutrient cycles occur at a relatively slow rate in tropical soils.

1.q_string: Speciation maintains biodiversity:
q_option: both at species level and community level
